pkgmetadata.longdescription: Univariate and Multivariate Spatial-Temporal Modeling // Fits univariate and multivariate spatio-temporal random effects models for point-referenced data using Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC). Details are given in Finley, Banerjee, and Gelfand (2015) doi:10.18637/jss.v063.i13 and Finley and Banerjee doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2019.104608.
